MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 postcode area of Tarporley, affecting properties in Waste Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:32am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10am on 25th April 2021.
